alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 12:47PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Box Elder County through 115 PM MDT... At 1247 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, or 44 miles southwest of Snowville, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Box Elder County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
